string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: Unlimited icon requests 4 all! We did some behind the scenes work to track icon requests better, if you\'re curious about the progress, take a look here.
A place to check launcher compatibility for all Arcticons versions.
âœ¨ Updates to make sure lots of apps work again.

ðŸ™‚ Some of you may have noticed the lack of updates. Please keep in mind that I and other contributors are doing this in our free time. That makes it hard to maintain Arcticons with a full-time job. We\'re doing our best to keep it up to date!
